This is my report.

```{r practice, echo=FALSE}
inputPanel(
  checkboxGroupInput(
        inputId="checked_groups",
        label="Which groups do you want to display?",
        choices=c("a","b","c"),
        selected=c("a","b","c")
      )
)

renderPlot({
    
    plot_dat<-filter(dat, Group %in% input$checked_groups)
    
     ggplot(
       dat=plot_dat,
       aes(x=varX,y=varY,color=Group))+geom_point()
  }
  )
```
